statements: SELECT * FROM PropertyValuations;
SELECT property_id, property_address, property_value FROM PropertyValuations;
SELECT property_address, appraiser_name FROM PropertyValuations WHERE property_value > 500000;
SELECT * FROM PropertyValuations WHERE appraisal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT property_id, property_address, appraisal_date FROM PropertyValuations ORDER BY appraisal_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PropertyValuations ORDER BY appraisal_date DESC, property_value ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT property_id, property_address FROM PropertyValuations WHERE appraisal_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT property_id, property_value, appraiser_name FROM PropertyValuations WHERE property_value > 100000 ORDER BY property_value DESC;
SELECT property_id, property_address, appraiser_name FROM PropertyValuations WHERE appraiser_name LIKE '%John%' AND property_address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT property_id, property_value, blockchain_hash FROM PropertyValuations WHERE property_value BETWEEN 50000 AND 200000 ORDER BY property_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM property_valuations;
SELECT property_address, valuation_amount FROM property_valuations ORDER BY valuation_amount DESC;
SELECT property_id, property_address, valuation_amount FROM property_valuations WHERE valuation_amount > 100000;
SELECT property_address, valuation_amount FROM property_valuations WHERE property_address LIKE '123%';
SELECT * FROM appraisals WHERE appraisal_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM appraisals WHERE property_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT property_address, valuation_amount FROM property_valuations ORDER BY valuation_amount DESC;
SELECT appraisal_id, appraiser_name, appraisal_date FROM appraisals WHERE appraiser_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM property_valuations JOIN appraisals ON property_valuations.property_id = appraisals.property_id WHERE property_valuations.valuation_amount > 100000;
SELECT property_id, property_address, valuation_amount FROM property_valuations WHERE valuation_amount BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000;
SELECT * FROM Property_Valuations;
SELECT valuation_amount, appraisal_date, appraiser_name FROM Property_Valuations WHERE property_id = 5;
SELECT property_address, property_type FROM Properties WHERE year_built > '2000-01-01';
SELECT owner_name, owner_contact FROM Properties WHERE property_type = 'Condo';
SELECT appraiser_name, specialty FROM Appraisers ORDER BY specialty DESC;
SELECT * FROM Property_Valuations ORDER BY appraisal_date DESC, valuation_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT property_id, valuation_amount FROM Property_Valuations WHERE valuation_amount > 100000 ORDER BY valuation_amount DESC;

SELECT p.property_address, pv.valuation_amount, a.appraiser_name FROM Properties p JOIN Property_Valuations pv ON p.id = pv.property_id JOIN Appraisers a ON pv.appraiser_name = a.appraiser_name WHERE pv.valuation_amount > 50000 AND a.specialty = 'Residential' ORDER BY pv.valuation_amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT pv.appraiser_name, a.contact_info FROM Property_Valuations pv JOIN Appraisers a ON pv.appraiser_name = a.appraiser_name;
SELECT pv.id, p.property_address, a.specialty FROM Property_Valuations pv JOIN Properties p ON pv.property_id = p.id JOIN Appraisers a ON pv.appraiser_name = a.appraiser_name;
SELECT * FROM property_valuations;
SELECT property_id, property_address, appraisal_value FROM property_valuations WHERE appraisal_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT appraiser_name, appraiser_license_number FROM appraisers ORDER BY appraiser_name DESC;
SELECT property_id, appraiser_id, transaction_hash FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_blocks ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM property_valuations WHERE appraisal_value > 100000
SELECT property_address, appraisal_value FROM property_valuations WHERE appraisal_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT appraiser_name, appraiser_license_number FROM appraisers ORDER BY appraiser_name DESC
SELECT property_address, appraisal_value, appraisal_date FROM property_valuations JOIN blockchain_transactions ON property_valuations.property_id = blockchain_transactions.property_id
SELECT * FROM blockchain_blocks WHERE timestamp > '2021-06-01' ORDER BY block_id
SELECT * FROM property_valuations;
SELECT property_address, property_value FROM property_valuations ORDER BY property_value DESC;
SELECT owner_name, owner_email FROM property_owners WHERE property_id = 1;
SELECT appraiser_name, certification_number FROM appraisers;
SELECT transaction_hash, timestamp FROM blockchain_records WHERE property_id = 2 AND appraiser_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM property_valuations;
SELECT property_address, property_value FROM property_valuations WHERE property_value > 100000 ORDER BY property_value DESC;

SELECT owner_name, owner_email, property_address FROM property_owners JOIN property_valuations ON property_owners.property_id = property_valuations.property_id WHERE owner_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY owner_name ASC;
SELECT appraiser_name, certification_number FROM appraisers WHERE LENGTH(appraiser_name) > 10 ORDER BY appraiser_name DESC;
SELECT property_address, appraisal_date, property_value FROM property_valuations WHERE appraisal_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND property_value < 50000 ORDER BY appraisal_date ASC;
